title: How to get your number 1 role 100% of the time
body:
So first thing is first, you are going to have to have at least one other member who you are going to play with, this doesn't work as a solo.

So for the example i am using, Player 1 want's mid, and Player 2 want's jungle.

Player 1 should set his roles as Mid first, Jungle second
Player 2 set's to Jungle first, Mid second

Now there may be a possible edge case where you get the other's role but because riot has stated that if swaps are agreed to they won't punish for swaps, then you can swap if that edge case happens.
